definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
revision history (of a document, web page etc)

sentences.english: Typically, each revision has a single predecessor or parent.
sentences.chinese: 通常情況下，每個修訂有一個前身，即父修訂。

sentences.english: Typically, each revision has a single predecessor or parent.
sentences.chinese: 通常情況下，每個修訂有一個前身，即父修訂。

sentences.english: He sent it for my review and I had revised it slightly. The resulting file is attached.
sentences.chinese: 他傳來給我校閱而我已略作修訂，完稿檔案附呈。

sentences.english: A big sticking point will be Merkel's insistence on renegotiating the Lisbon treaty.
sentences.chinese: 目前的關鍵在於默克爾堅持要修訂里斯本條約。

sentences.english: The revision of Accounting Law is a great event in the accounting reform of our country.
sentences.chinese: 《會計法》的修訂是我國會計改革的一件大事。

sentences.english: A revision of that English book will be published in May this year.
sentences.chinese: 那本英文書的修訂版將於今年五月出版。

sentences.english: Expurgating this book took up most of my time.
sentences.chinese: 修訂這本書佔用了我大部分時間。

sentences.english: Then, development and recension of the questionnaires.
sentences.chinese: 其次，量表的開發與修訂。

sentences.english: Therefore, studies on Mao' Edition extremely has the value.
sentences.chinese: 所以研究毛氏對《三國》的修訂是非常有價值的。

sentences.english: A case against Google could update antitrust law for the Internet age.
sentences.chinese: 指控谷歌可能爲互聯網時代修訂反托拉斯法。

sentences.english: I have amended the BOM cost of the various products.
sentences.chinese: 我已修訂了各個產品的BOM成本。

sentences.english: You can redact a word simply by selecting it with your mouse cursor.
sentences.chinese: 只要通過簡單地移動鼠標，就可以修訂一個單詞。

sentences.english: and why do we make it so hard to amend our constitution.
sentences.chinese: 正是因此，我們修訂憲法纔會如此困難。

sentences.english: Continuous improvement and modification of perfect quality criteria.
sentences.chinese: 良品條件的持續改善與修訂。

sentences.english: Describe the content modification of national standard for cold heading and cold extruding.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了冷鐓和冷擠壓用鋼國家標準的修訂內容。

sentences.english: Write a second draft that accommodates new material and revisions.
sentences.chinese: 寫出添加了新材料並修訂過的第二稿。

definition: to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
